com.parworks.androidlibrary.ar
Class ARSites

java.lang.Object
  com.parworks.androidlibrary.ar.ARSites

public class ARSites
extends java.lang.Object

Used for Synchronously and Asynchronously finding, managing, and creating ARSites

Author:
Jules White, Adam Hickey

create

public void create(java.lang.String id,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   double lon,
                   double lat,
                   java.lang.String desc,
                   java.lang.String feature,
                   java.lang.String channel,
                   ARListener<ARSite> listener)
Asynchronously create an ARSite

Parameters:
id - the id of the site. Will be used for all site accesses
name - the name of the site
lon - longitude of the site
lat - latitude of the site
desc - site description
feature - site feature
channel - site channel
listener - callback that provides an ARSite object when the call completes

Asynchronously create an ARSite

Parameters:
id - the id of the site. Will be used for all site accesses
desc - site description
channel - site channel
listener - callback that provides an ARSite object when the call completes

near

public void near(double lat,
                 double lon,
                 ARListener<java.util.List<ARSite>> sites)
Asynchronously finds the site nearest a given latitude and longitude. This method does not specify the maximum number of sites, and so the default is one. Use near(double, double, int, double, ARListener) to retrieve multiple sites.

Parameters:
lat - latitude
lon - longitude
sites - the callback which provides a list of sites nearest the coordinates

near

public void near(double lat,
                 double lon,
                 int max,
                 double radius,
                 ARListener<java.util.List<ARSite>> sites)
Asynchronously finds the sites nearest a set of coordinates

Parameters:
lat - latitude
lon - longitude
max - the maximum number of sites to return.
radius - the radius in which to search
sites - the callback which provides a list of the nearest ARSites

getExisting

public void getExisting(java.lang.String id,
                        ARListener<ARSite> listener)
Asynchronously get a previously created site

Parameters:
id - the id of the site
listener - the callback which provides the ARSite once the call completes

                     java.lang.String desc,
                     java.lang.String channel)
Synchronously create an ARSite

Parameters:
id - the site id. Will be used for accessing the site.

channel - the site channel
Returns:
the newly created ARSite

near

public java.util.List<ARSite> near(double lat,
                                   double lon)
Synchronously finds the site closest to the given latitude and longitude.

Parameters:
lat - latitude
lon - longitude
Returns:
a list containing the closest ARSite to the given coordinates

near

public java.util.List<ARSite> near(double lat,
                                   double lon,
                                   int max,
                                   double radius)
Synchronously finds the closest sites to the given coordinates.

Parameters:
lat - latitude
lon - longitude
max - the maximum number of sites to return
radius - the distance from the coordinates in which to search
Returns:
a list of the nearby sites
